name: Day of the Dead
prompt: A VibeDeck controller decorated for Day of the Dead. Sugar skull patterns painted on the body. Marigold orange, hot pink, turquoise, and black colors. Intricate floral designs and skeleton motifs. The buttons are decorated like sugar skull eyes. Gold leaf accents. The rotary knob has a calavera (skull) design. Celebratory, vibrant, honoring tradition. Surrounded by marigold petals. Warm festive lighting.
why: Cultural celebration, vibrant colors, meaningful symbolism
